00032 class EffectToneGen:public Effect {
00033 
00034  public:
00035    EffectToneGen();
00036    // A 'Chirp' is a tone that changes in frequency.
00037    EffectToneGen & EnableForChirps(){mbChirp=true;return *this;};
00038 
00039    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00040       return wxString(mbChirp? _("Chirp..."):_("Tone..."));
00041    }
00042 
00043    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00044       std::set<wxString> result;
00045       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#GeneratorPlugin"));
00046       return result;
00047    }
00048 
00049    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00050       return wxString(mbChirp ? wxT("Chirp") : wxT("Tone"));
00051    }
00052 
00053    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00054       return wxString(mbChirp? _("Generating Chirp") : _("Generating Tone"));
00055    }
00056 
00057    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set.
00058    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00059 
00060    virtual int GetEffectFlags() {
00061       return BUILTIN_EFFECT | INSERT_EFFECT;
00062    }
00063 
00064    virtual bool PromptUser();
00065    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00066 
00067    virtual bool Process();
00068 
00069  protected:
00070    virtual bool MakeTone(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00071 
00072  private:
00073 
00074    sampleCount numSamples;
00075    bool mbChirp;
00076    bool mbLogInterpolation;
00077 
00078    double mPositionInCycles;
00079 
00080    // If we made these static variables, 
00081    // Tone and Chirp would share the same parameters.
00082    int waveform;
00083    float frequency[2];
00084    float amplitude[2];
00085    double length;
00086    float logFrequency[2];
00087    double mCurRate;
00088    int interpolation;
00089 
00090    // mSample is an external placeholder to remember the last "buffer"
00091    // position so we use it to reinitialize from where we left
00092    int mSample;
00093  // friendship ...
00094  friend class ToneGenDialog;
00095 
00096 };
